title: Lotto results LIVE: Winning numbers for Saturday's £11.2m National Lottery prize
text:
Winners of tonight's National Lottery will scoop a whopping £11.2m prize.

There were no winners on Thursday, meaning this weekend's draw is a quadruple rollover.

It may not be in the same league as the £170million EuroMillions prize won on Tuesday night - but these jackpots are big by UK Lotto standards.

The stunning prize is more than enough to allow winners to splash out on the car or home of their dreams.

Tonight’s winning Lotto numbers are: 23, 27, 30, 36, 40, 42

And the bonus ball is: 58

Tonight’s winning Thunderball numbers are: 05, 08, 21, 26, 38

And the Thunderball is: 01

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

Follow live updates below...
description: Tonight's UK National Lottery is quadruple rollover - follow our live blog below for the results of the draw
